=================================================
### Commonwealth Treasury Department: Request for Standing Offer: Wooden Chair Components

Released by the:
Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Reference and Solicitation

* Number: WS3737163330
* RFSO Reference Number: WS3737163330-Doc3854759254
* Amendment Number: 1

## Announcement Details

* Publication Date: February 2, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2023, 02:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Date: February 1, 2023 - January 30, 2026

## Description of Work

Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of CORCAN invites bidders to submit their interest for the purchase, delivery, and installation of wooden chair components. This Request for Standing Offer will be awarded to the supplier whose bid is considered the lowest price.

## Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

## End User

* Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* Address: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0P9

## Contact Information

* Christopher Finnigan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice and Access

To access the full Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) and attachments, please visit [this link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15302436?extsite=MTUzMDI0MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) and log into your SAP Ariba account and Government of Canada profile.

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Pre-qualified Supplies and Services that may be used to meet Canadian Trade Agreement (CFTA) obligations:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity

* The Government is interested in receiving bids from qualified suppliers across the following regions:
	+ Newfoundland and Labrador
	+
